original_text: But people who wait for the Lord to help them will receive new strength. They will rise up high, as if they have the wings of eagles. They will run and they will not become tired. They will walk and they will not become weak. But people who wait for the Lord to help them will receive new strength. They will rise up high, as if they have the wings of eagles. They will run and they will not become tired. They will walk and they will not become weak. But people who wait for the Lord to help them will receive new strength. They will rise up high, as if they have the wings of eagles. They will run and they will not become tired. They will walk and they will not become weak. They will walk and they will not become weak. But people who wait for the Lord to help them
korean_text: 오직 여호와를 앙망하는 자는 새 힘을 얻으리니 독수리가 날개치며 올라감 같을 것이요 달음박질하여도 곤비하지 아니하겠고 걸어가도 피곤하지 아니하리로다

sentences.original_text: But people who wait for the Lord
to help them will receive new strength
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 도우시는 주님께 새 힘을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as if they have the wings of eagles
and they will not become tired
and they will not become weak
